mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_pay_bill (digest, money, state, lastPayTime, payChannel, createTime, updateTime, user_id, nickName, unionPaySn, businessType, businessKey, shop_id, orderSn) VALUES ( #{digest}, #{money}, #{state}, #{lastPayTime}, #{payChannel}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{user_id}, #{nickName}, #{unionPaySn}, #{businessType}, #{businessKey}, #{shop_id}, #{orderSn} );
